author: Jan Konieczny
comment: It's ok, but would be great to have: - option to fetch only 'top stories' rather than just 'most recent' - option to filter out some accounts (some just post pictures, pretty useless with this app) - pull in pictures (and if it's a link - then follow up with metadata preview like FB does)

author: Alana Coleman
comment: I like this app, would be better with your friend statuses or even just pictures for who I'm following pages.

author: chris darcy
comment: The updated version works well, but only shows post from pages, not people. Guessing this is something you are working on? Looking forward to the next update, thanks for the hard work

reply.author: Marcin Wróblewski
reply.content: Yes, we're looking forward to add feature like that. Thanks for support!

title: New version works well

author: bumpy blood
comment: An I registered like the instructions said but still will not work...waste of time.

reply.author: Marcin Wróblewski
reply.content: We've had some issues but now the app is working. Please check it again.

title: Does not work!!

comment: Just get a notification saying it can't get any notifications and I should check my phone has an internet connection. Even though Facebook is running fine on my phone.

reply.content: We've had some issues but now the app is working. Please check it again.
